# prominentValues

**Instance Property**

Values in this array may receive unique visual representations or behaviors.

## Declaration

```swift
@nonobjc var prominentValues: [Float] { get set }
```

## Accessing the control value

- **value**: The current value of the slider.
- **localizedValueFormat**: A localized string that defines the presentation of the slider’s value.

items.description: The current value of the slider.
